protocol.text: The seeds were kept in water for 3 days at 4 degrees centigrade prior to sowing. Seeds were placed individually on compost and placed in a controlled environment room (CER). The growth regime was 10h light 14h dark, 22 degrees centigrade with 60% humidity. The plants were watered every day. After 5 weeks growth in the CER, the rosettes were harvested by cutting the plant at the top of the root and freezing immediately in liquid nitrogen. Harvesting was done at 12 noon, 4 hours after the lights had come on. Ten rosettes were pooled for each replicate, and three replicates were harvested.
Labelled using protocol described in Affymetrix manual "3' IVT Express Kit User Manual"
Biotin Labelled cRNA using "Affymetrix GeneChip Hybridization, Wash and Stain Kit", according to guidelines set out by Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA
Scanned according to guidelines set out by Affymetrix, Santa Clara, CA.
Raw data from the microarrays was normalized at probe-level using MAS5 algorithm. The detection calls (present, marginal, absent) for each probe set was obtained using the GCOS system
